name: Fatal Shot
description:
Controls:

WASD for movement
LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT
C to open store/Pause
Press space and any movement key to dash
Press the number  keys to switch weapons
1=Pistol
2=machinegun
3=shotgun
4=burst rifle
5=plasma gun
r=Rocket launcher
e= Plasma sniper
q = BDG 900

============================================================

FATAL SHOT

An Endless horde survival game With an ever increasing difficulty!!! Prepare to fight the zombies and upgrade your weapons. How long can you survive!

 

Made With scratch

This game was made with scratch a lovely engine that teaches you to code.

 

Continuous Update

Fatal Shot receives continuous updates.

Post your ideas for updates here:   https://www.reddit.com/user/FS_updates/comments/j5mb9a/fatal_shot_updates_page/
